DOC.brief_summary: The study involves research, the purpose of which is to compare three different drug mixtures (Epinephrine, Phenylephrine 25 µg, or Phenylephrine 50 µg). Specifically, how long each medicine lasts will be studied.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Trial Comparing Epinephrine Versus Phenylephrine as a Vasoconstrictor in Regional Anesthesia for Upper Extremity Surgery
DOC.criteria: Shoulder surgery with regional anesthesia Shoulder surgery with general anesthesia unhealthy
